ygData.subject: RE: Lambent Lament
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The shin greaves are going to be popular (i.e. you ll have a hard time finding a free set) as they re the same AC, weight, and color as steel plate (the
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 27 Oct 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> I can't believe how many tells I have gotten over my shin greaves and shin
> gauntlets. Apparently the color is one many people find appealing. I
> didn't have the heart to tell them I will be getting rid of them as soon as
> I can get their paired components.

The shin greaves are going to be popular (i.e. you'll have a
hard time finding a "free" set) as they're the same AC,
weight, and color as steel plate (the ones that cost 420pp)
and have +5 disease resist(?) to boot. I saw a lot of people
offering them the first couple days, but it's slowly died down
as more people figure this out.

The icy greaves are worse than normal plate, but have the blue
color of lambent. I expect they'll become popular too, as it
gives a nice "blue jeans" effect when combined with normal
armor.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
